title: Como posso usar o RedCarpet sem CodeRay para implementar descontos nos meus blogs?
author_association: https://www.gravatar.com/avatar/# {Digest :: MD5.hexdigest (user.email)} ", largura: 60 \ r \ n \ tend \ r \ n \ r \ n \ tclasse CodeRayify <Redcarpet :: Render :: HTML \ r \ n \ t \ tdef block_code (c√≥digo, idioma) \ r \ n \ t \ t \ tCodeRay.scan (c√≥digo, idioma ||: texto) .div \ r \ n \ t \ tend \ r \ n \ tend \ r \ n \ r \ n \ tdef markdown (texto) \ r \ n \ t \ tcoderayify = CodeRayify.new (filter_html: true, hard_wrap: true) \ r \ n \ r \ n \ t \ toptions = {\ r \ n \ t \ t \ tfenced_code_blocks: true , \ r \ n \ t \ t \ tno_intra_emphasis: true, \ r \ n \ t \ t \ tautolink: true, \ r \ n \ t \ t \ tlax_html_blocks: true, \ r \ n \ t \ t} \ r \ n \ r \ n \ t \ tmarkdown_to_html = Redcarpet :: Markdown.new (coderayify, op√ß√µes) \ r \ n \ t \ tmarkdown_to_html.render (texto) .html_safe \ r \ n \ tend \ r \ n \ r \ n \ tdef blog_status_color blog \ r \ n \ t \ t'color: vermelho; ' if blog.draft? \ r \ n \ tend \ r \ nend \ r \ n \ r \ n \ r \ n \ r \ n \ r \ n \ ``

\ r \ n \ t \ t \ tautolink: true, \ r \ n \ t \ t \ tlax_html_blocks: true, \ r \ n \ t \ t} \ r \ n \ r \ n \ t \ tmarkdown_to_html = Redcarpet: : Markdown.new (coderayify, op√ß√µes) \ r \ n \ t \ tmarkdown_to_html.render (texto) .html_safe \ r \ n \ tend \ r \ n \ r \ n \ tdef blog_status_color blog \ r \ n \ t \ t 'cor vermelha;' if blog.draft? \ r \ n \ tend \ r \ nend \ r \ n \ r \ n \ r \ n \ r \ n \ r \ n \ ``

\ r \ n \ t \ t \ tautolink: true, \ r \ n \ t \ t \ tlax_html_blocks: true, \ r \ n \ t \ t} \ r \ n \ r \ n \ t \ tmarkdown_to_html = Redcarpet: : Markdown.new (coderayify, op√ß√µes) \ r \ n \ t \ tmarkdown_to_html.render (texto) .html_safe \ r \ n \ tend \ r \ n \ r \ n \ tdef blog_status_color blog \ r \ n \ t \ t 'cor vermelha;' if blog.draft? \ r \ n \ tend \ r \ nend \ r \ n \ r \ n \ r \ n \ r \ n \ r \ n \ ``
